name: Santa Delivery
description:
Santa is in hurry, he need you to help him drop the gifts down the chimneys! Don't worry the gifts are not fragile. :P

Controls:
Left click, touch screen or press space to drop the gift.

Gameplay:
Giving gift to naughty child, missing a nice child or unsuccessful gift throws each cost 1 life.
A successful drop gives 100 points. 

^^ My high score is 900. 

Have fun! Merry Christmas!

For mobile devices, I uploaded an apk as Unity WebGL is not mobile friendly.
